response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and expertise. Given its worth to us, we're considering an offer of $18,000 for it. We believe this price reflects not only its market value but also acknowledges the unique benefits and features that align closely with your needs and interests. Please let us know if this proposal resonates with your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 18000}
